Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • drmeepster.drcorester.common.util.Util

  • public final class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utility methods and constants for DrCorester
    Author:
    DrMeepster

      • SECTION_SIGN

        public static final char SECTION_SIGN
        The Unicode symbol (U+00A7 167) that Minecraft uses to format text.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DAMAGE_WRATH

        public static final net.minecraft.util.DamageSource DAMAGE_WRATH
        The DamageSource used by wrath(EntityLivingBase) and wrath(EntityLivingBase, Achievement).
        See Also:
        wrath(EntityLivingBase), wrath(EntityLivingBase, Achievement)

      • SPECTATOR

        public static final java.util.function.BiPredicate<net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer,java.lang.Integer> SPECTATOR
        Evaluates whether player is a spectator based on a few rules: If specRule is 0, player must not be a spectator. If specRule is 1, the spectator status of player. If specRule is 2, player must be a spectator.

      • XOR

        public static final java.util.function.BiPredicate<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Boolean> XOR
        Performs a boolean XOR (Exclusive Or) operation on a and b.

      • XNOR

        public static final java.util.function.BiPredicate<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Boolean> XNOR
        Performs a boolean XNOR (Exclusive Not Or) operation on a and b.

                                                  int trackingRange,

                                                  boolean sendsVelocityUpdates)
        Registers an IBasicEntity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The IBasicEntity to register. MUST BE AN INSTANCE OF Entity
        trackingRange - Unknown
        updateFrequency - Unknown. Recommended value: 1
        sendsVelocityUpdates - Unknown. Recommended value: true
        Returns:
        entity

      • register

        public static <T extends IBasicEntity> T register(T entity,
                                                  int trackingRange,
                                                  int updateFrequency,
                                                  boolean sendsVelocityUpdates,
                                                  int eggPrimary,
                                                  int eggSecondary)
        Registers an IBasicEntity and its spawn egg.
        Parameters:
        entity - The IBasicEntity to register. MUST BE AN INSTANCE OF Entity
        trackingRange - Unknown
        updateFrequency - Unknown. Recommended value: 1
        sendsVelocityUpdates - Unknown. Recommended value: true
        eggPrimary - The primary color of the spawn egg
        eggSecondary - The secondary color of the spawn egg
        Returns:
        entity

                                                        int primary,
                                                        int secondary)

        Parameters:
        entity - The IBasicEntity to have its spawn egg registered. Make sure it is already registered. MUST BE AN INSTANCE OF Entity
        primary - The primary color of the spawn egg
        secondary - The secondary color of the spawn egg

      • getPlayersAtPos

        public static <T> java.util.ArrayList<net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer> getPlayersAtPos(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                                                                                net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                                                                                java.util.function.BiPredicate<net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer,T> condition,
                                                                                                T input)
        Returns all the players at pos.
        Parameters:
        world - The World that contains the players to detect.
        pos - The position where players are being detected.
        condition - This BiPredicate must return true when given a player and input for that player to be added to the output list.
        input - A value to be given to condition.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList that contains all players at pos.

      • clearAir

        public static net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos clearAir(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                                        net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                                        float tooHardThreshold,
                                                        boolean breakTileEnts)
        Destroys all blocks in a column up from pos until either the top of the world is reached or a block that cannot be destroyed is found.
        Parameters:
        world - The current world.
        pos - Where to start destroying blocks.
        tooHardThreshold - If the hardness of a block exceeds or equals this, it is not broken.
        breakTileEnts - If false, it will not break TileEntities
        Returns:
        The position of the last block broken

        Parameters:

      • stuffToItemstackArray

        public static net.minecraft.item.ItemStack[] stuffToItemstackArray(java.lang.Object... recipeComponents)
        Uses the same code as GameRegistry to transform an array of Objects into an array of ItemStacks. used by ShapedRecipes constructors

        The proper format is:
        {
        "ABC",
        "ABA",
        "CAC",
        'A', <SOME ITEM>,
        'B', <SOME ITEM>,
        'C', <SOME ITEM>
        }
        Parameters:
        recipeComponents - The components of the recipe
        Returns:
        An ItemStack array usable by ShapedRecipes constructors.
        See Also:
        GameRegistry.addShapedRecipe(ItemStack, Object...), GameRegistry.addRecipe(ItemStack, Object...)

      • pitchToDir

        public static net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing pitchToDir(float pitch)
        Changes a float into an EnumFacing: either EnumFacing.DOWN or EnumFacing.UP.
        Parameters:
        pitch - The pitch to be converted.
        Returns:
        EnumFacing.DOWN or EnumFacing.UP, depending on pitch.

      • getNextMapColor

        public static int getNextMapColor()
        Gets the next available index in the MapColor array.
        Returns:
        The next available index in the MapColor array or -1 if it is full.

      • chunkBound

        public static int chunkBound(net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing dir,
                             int x,
                             int z)
        Returns the x/y/z bound of the Chunk at the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        dir - Which direction to get the bound of.
        x - The X coordinate of the Chunk.
        z - The Z coordinate of the Chunk.
        Returns:

      • randomInt

        public static int randomInt(int a,
                            int b,
                            java.util.Random r)
        A version of Random.nextInt() and Random.nextInt(int) which allows upper and lower bounds (inclusive). These bounds can be in any order.
        Parameters:
        a - One bound of the random int.
        b - One bound of the random int.
        r - The Random for the operation.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        Random.nextInt(), Random.nextInt(int)

      • randomInt

        public static int randomInt(int a,
                            int b)
        A version of Random.nextInt() and Random.nextInt(int) which allows upper and lower bounds (inclusive). These bounds can be in any order.
        Parameters:
        a - One bound of the random int.
        b - One bound of the random int.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        Random.nextInt(), Random.nextInt(int)
